Summary: A condition that causes redness and often small, red, pus - filled bumps on the face.
Rosacea most commonly affects middle - aged women with fair skin.
It can be mistaken for acne or other skin conditions
Duration: Can last for years or be lifelong
Symptoms: Persistent redness in the central part of your face.
Develop pimples on their face that resemble acne.
Experience dry, irritated, swollen eyes and red, swollen eyelids.
